title: Create Bootstrap Automation Script
description: Implement scripts/bootstrap.py for automated template detection and environment generation. Include scoring algorithm for template selection, file structure generation, and initial task creation from specifications.
notes: Functions: detect_template(), extract_indicators(), score_templates(), generate_base_structure(), populate_command_files(). Environment generation in 2-3 seconds vs 20-30 seconds with LLM. Must create initial task breakdown structure if complex project detected.
assumptions: Template scoring rules documented in template-selection-rules.md
decision_rationale: Bootstrap automation dramatically speeds up project initialization and ensures consistent environment structure. Template detection accuracy is critical for user experience.
